attributes.action: to make it law that when a prime minister quits during office a general election must be held
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since our current P.M is making a hash of the country and was not elected,I would like to see a law passed to ensure that a non elected M.P can never ru(i)n the country again

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
